DataElement.preferredName: Ped-PRO-CTCAE Past 7 Days Severity of Muscle Pain Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response in the past 7 days about how badly their muscles hurt, using a 4-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Ped-PRO-CTCAE Past Week Severity of Muscle Pain Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference,and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient prespective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.:The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about the severity of an individual's muscle pain._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference,and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient prespective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.

Concepts.definition: A measurement system that characterized the frequency, severity, interference, and presence/absence of symptomatic toxicities that include pain, fatigue, nausea, and cutaneous side effects such as rash and hand-foot syndrome, all toxicities that can be meaningfully reported from the patient perspective. The pediatric module permits self-reporting by children and adolescents ages 7-17 years.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes; Did not have any, A little bad, Bad, Very bad

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual did not experience something.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual did not experience something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's experience with something was a little bad.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's experience with something was a little bad.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's experience with something was bad.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's experience with something was bad.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's experience with something was very bad.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's experience with something was very bad.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: In the past 7 days, how bad did your muscles hurt?
